verbose_text: Besides inhibition of tyrosine receptor signaling, induction of ROS in tumor cells also underlies the antitumor activity of sorafenib XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, which prompted us to explore whether melatonin could significantly enhance the anti-leukemia activity of sorafenib though redox modification and achieve a synergistic therapeutic effects.
evidence: ROS in tumor cells also underlies the antitumor activity of sorafenib
